description:
Carlton is from the south, where he's in his last year of college working toward his finance degree.
"What are you planning on doing after college?" I asked him.
"I don't know. The job market is kind of tough right now."
Carlton is always smiling. No matter what he says, it's with a smile.
"So are you gay or straight?"
"Gay," he replied. "Definitely gay." No hesitation at all. I like that.
"Are you a top or bottom?"
"It depends on the guy, definitely," he replied.
"I noticed that all of your hair is blond. Everywhere!"
And it was. Arms, chest, pubes... even his eyebrows!
title: Carlton
